casebody.data:
Johnathan ERDMAN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Elizabeth VOPAVA, n/k/a Elizabeth Mumford, Defendant-Appellee. No. 18-0138 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed December 5, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Johnathan Erdman appeals from the district court's order regarding his petition for modification of child custody. AFFIRMED.

AFFIRMED.
